Content.value: I’m a nearly graduating full stack software developer focused on Java and web technologies, an experienced audio designer and a composer with diverse communication skills. I’m currently looking for an opportunity to combine and hone my acquired skills in gaming industry or software development. With me you not only get a reliable and flexible employee, but I also function as a mind soothing beacon in group work environments. I prefer jolly co-operation over competition.

projectContent.value: In this project we learned how Agile development works by designing and implementing our own Java desktop software in a small group. We chose to create an app for gamers to monitor their skill progression, via statistics and charts. New essential technologies that we learned during the project were: Java with Maven and Hibernate (MySQL, MariaDB), Jenkins and Continuous Integration, use of external API’s with JSON and localization.
Audio design for a mobile game: BvB Racing (iOS) by Tuokio

All audio design and implementation along with all the recording, voice acting and composing in close co-operation with Tuokio’s dev team. For this project I had some out of the box ideas like using human voice only to make all the car engine sounds.
Theme song for Teräspelaaja-award sponsored by Lindab
Designed and composed a theme song for a hockey/football team award. The customer wanted an epic sounding (Dark Knight, Gladiator) movie soundtrack theme.
Lotta Sandholm - From Good To Bad, Idols (Finland) finalist 2011
Produced and co-wrote a self-published single together with the artist.
